subject: Policy Guidelines for Development of Wayside Amenities along National Highways and Expressways- Pre-approved Access Permissions  - reg.
text: HRa 754 TTHNf gifeasrut (Tsw qRdev # RTHNf HATT4,  HRa TTFT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) T #i-5 Q 6, 4az7-10, Erq, 75f fcaft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 T/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/ Access Permission/ 2023 Policy Circular No.14.23/ 2023 dated 23rd January, 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHLML/2O22/Access/01 (Comp. No. 183132)} Sub.: Policy Guidelines for   Development of Wayside Amenities along National Highways and Expressways- Pre-approved Access Permissions reg: Ref: a) NHAI Policy Guidelines for  Development of Wayside Amenities  along National Highways and Expressways vide Circular No. 18.50/2020 dated 20.08.2020 b) Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for Award of Wayside Amenities along National Highways and Expressways vide Circular No. 18.79 dated 11.03.2022 The Ministry of Road Transport and Highways (MoRT&H) is   undertaking the development   of Wayside Amenities in Public Private Partnership (PPP) mode through National Highways Authority of India (NHAI), as per the guidelines issued in Policy Guidelines for Development of Wayside Amenities along National Highways and Expressways. 2 NHAI NHLML has been   receiving   large number of   grievances from private concessionaires stated to be facing problems in getting access permission for highways. 3 The matter has been examined and it has been decided with the approval of Competent Authority that concessionaire selected by NHAI/ NHLML for development of Wayside Amenities shall have pre-approved deemed access permission to the Highways/ Expressways and need not apply to Highway Administrator for any access permission and not required to pay any license fee/processing fee. 4_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 23 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: AlI Officers of NHAI HQI ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1_ Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2. Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3. Web Admin for circulation: A 7 7 9 NHAL 2g/ol Copy
